parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear brake can cause the motorcycle to lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The rear brake locks up or drags
the motorcycle stops suddenly
the brakes vibrate or shudder
the rider experiences a loss of control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the manufacturer to properly notify owners of recalls and provide timely repairs can lead to accidents, injuries, or fatalities due to faulty brakes.
symptoms: Owners are not notified of recalls
parts are not available for repairs
dealerships are uncooperative or inaccessible
owners experience difficulties in getting their vehicles repaired.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design flaw in the brake system can cause the brakes to malfunction, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The brakes vibrate or shudder when applied
the brakes do not function properly in certain temperature conditions
the rider experiences a loss of control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission shifting issues can cause the motorcycle to lose power, throw the rider off balance, and increase the risk of accidents, especially when shifting down or up while in traffic.
symptoms: The transmission randomly shifts from one gear to another
the transmission pops out of gear
the transmission sticks or locks up
the gearshift is difficult to operate
the motorcycle loses power or momentum.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The oil leak from the front fork can lead to reduced braking performance, increased stopping distance, and potentially cause a loss of control, which can result in accidents.
symptoms: Oil dripping onto the caliper and front wheel
reduced braking performance
increased stopping distance.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The front-end wobble/vibration can cause loss of control, reduced stability, and increased risk of accidents, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: Front-end wobble/vibration
difficulty steering
reduced stability
scalloping or cupping type wear on the edges of the front tire.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the instrumental panel lighting can reduce visibility, making it difficult for the rider to operate the motorcycle safely, especially at night or in low-light conditions.
symptoms: Instrumental panel lighting does not illuminate normally
difficulty seeing the handlebars.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Heated Seat and Handle Grip Malfunction
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the heated seat and handle grip system can cause discomfort and distraction to the rider, potentially leading to accidents or decreased vehicle control.
symptoms: The heat element sometimes does not turn on
sometimes turns off after being switched on
and may not even turn on when activated.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Front End Vibration and Neck Bearing Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The front end vibration can cause loss of control, accidents, or damage to the vehicle, while the neck bearing failure can lead to premature wear on other components and affect the overall handling and stability of the motorcycle.
symptoms: The front end of the vehicle vibrates while driving at speeds between 30-40 mph.
